overview:
Barry Lindquist is a Managing Principal at GMB Mezzanine. Barry was most recently a consultant to a Minneapolis-headquartered financial services company, focused on various risk management programs for the firm. Prior to the consulting business, he spent over nine years with Churchill Capital, Inc. in a variety of investment and marketing roles. Most recently at Churchill, he served as Senior Vice President of Corporate Marketing, responsible for all aspects of referral source marketing for various investment initiatives.

Prior to joining Churchill, Barry worked in a private banking and corporate banking at Citibank for 22 years in a variety of management and senior credit officer positions. He holds a BS from the University of Wisconsin and an MBA from the University of Michigan.
